name: DataClient
title: Google
Cloud
Bigtable
DataClient
description:
DataClient

A Bigtable client for data oprations.

Read, wirite, update and delete of table data

methods.name: table
title: Google
Cloud
Bigtable
DataClient#table
methods.description:
Get table data operations client for read, write and delete rows

See Google::Cloud::Bigtable::TableDataOperations for list of operations

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/bigtable"

client = Google::Cloud::Bigtable.new(instance_id: "instance-id")

table = client.table("table-name")

table.read_rows(rows_limit: 10) do |row|
  p row
end

params.name: app_profile_id
params.description:
This value specifies routing for replication. If not specified, the
“default” application profile will be used.
